content.detailedDescription:
I am reporting this for my mom, she sent me out to try and figure out what she saw.  i haven't found much on the internet, so i figured i would try here-
saturday, october 9, 2010 between 10:30 and 11:00 pm
darlene w. was taking the dogs out before going to bed.  she stood between the barn and the garage, shielding her eyes from a security light in the back yard, and looked straight up.  the night sky was clear and the stars bright. this is when she saw a flash, remarking that it was like a camera flash, circular and about the size of a quarter.  the flash was white and very bright, but only lasting the length of a camera flash.  the flash was followed by another one in the same area, same size and duration, but light red in color this time. she was frightened by the experience and went inside.  she got my dad, raymond w., to come outside and look at the sky with her.  they both didn't see anything.  she hasn't seen anything since.  thoughts about the flash were something colliding in space or a satellite reflecting light from the sun.
content.summary: White and red flashes in the night sky

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on our back patio soaking up some sun when i noticed a very bright object traveling slowly from the southwest to the northeast which is unusual for any jets since we are in an east to west jet corridor - it was going to cross the sun and i held my hand to block the sun and as it emerged i called my wife who was also outside and she also said it looked weird, unlike any jets that we see passing over and to the south of us each day. we watched for about another 30-45 seconds until it simply faded away. i continued sitting there and watching in the same general direction and another one as bright as the first one was coming from the west to east, crossed under the sun and shortly (probably 10 seconds) after crossing the sun it too faded. we have lived in this house for 24 years and observed many aircraft and as stated above, a main east west corridor is directly to the south and we often watch jets as we sit on the back porch, these two objects just seem so high i thought maybe it was the space station but checking online it does not appear to be crossing this area and then to see another one within 10 minutes going in a different direction, i simply do not know. i had no intention of reporting this until i saw a video of multiple or similar looking objects taken over new york city. their timeline was apparently earlier than ours by about 1 to 1 1/2 hours.
content.summary: Two bright objects so high it looked like a star crossed the sky about 2:45-3pm

content.detailedDescription: I never reported this event, but now that i've been to my first ufo meeting, i feel obligated to finally report this.  it was 1977 at dusk, around 7 pm, during the summer. i was walking my dog on a leash and i was barefoot and wearing a summer teeshirt and shorts. i was 15 yrs old at the time.  this was in york, pa in springettsbury township.  i was walking on a parallel street to s. marshall street. on my left were houses, on my left a church and then the main highway.  i happened to glance up at the sky at a distance and i saw a faint object. as it very quickly flew towards me it got larger and larger. then it was hovering right along side me just above the church parking lot.  it was mammoth size. it was a silver disc shape. there was a dome at the top and then in the middle were red blinking lights circling around the disc. then below the red lights was the silver disc part that came out. i noticed a hmmming noise and i looked down at my schnauzer and he was looking up at it with his ears perked back. that's how i knew i wasn't imagining it. he was hearing the humming noise too. the humming noise and the red lights going around the disc were the most unusual features about it. i couldn't figure out why it was just hovering in that spot. after about 5 minutes, it then went up quickly about 100 feet and then it started going back towards the location from where it came from. as it flew away it got faster and faster to the point where it looked like it was dissipating. planes never look like they're disintegrating from going to fast. that was my experience.
content.summary: Was walking dog and ufo flew in from distance and hovered above me 5 minutes

content.detailedDescription:
So it's ufo disclosure day right? like everyone else i was waiting for something to happen. my son was sent home sick from school today so my whole family was just sitting together in the living room watching tv and we kept hearing large helicopters outside.  we had a twin rotor military helicopter fly over our house at least seven times in an hour.  we do live very close to cak, but it's 10/13 so i decided to go outside and start taking pictures.  the helicopter flew over only once while i was out there and i took a video of it on my cell phone...That was the last time i saw it at 3:01 p.M.
i took the photo with the unexplained object at 3:47 p.M.  -- there were no helicopters in the sky at that time. choppers are noisy, my husband and i would have noticed helicopter noise. it was quiet, only the two of us talking to each other.

we were looking at the jets in the distance, ****nick noted how they were moving across the sky faster than normal commercial jets, so i snapped a few pictures.  at the time ****nick and i were in the back yard alone.  we heard no strange noise, we saw nothing out of the ordinary.  it was only after we were looking at the pics on the camera that we saw the object.  at first i thought it was dirt on the lcd screen so i went to the next pic and the spot disappeared.  i went back to the last picture and the spot was back, so i put the memory card in my lap top and zoomed in.  the dark object on the right of photo dscf1956 is clearly not a bird or a plane or a helicopter. i honestly do not know what it is and i can't figure it out, which is why i am making this mufon report.

i also snapped some pictures of a normal helicopter flying over hours later, and it does not look at all like the object i captured that i can't explain. 

i don't want to jump to a wild conclusion.  i was admittedly out in my back yard purposely looking for something out of the ordinary.  i honestly never expected to find it though.  and maybe it really is just wishful thinking.  i'm trying to be skeptical about this.  i don't know what it could be in the picture with the unidentified flying object.
i didn't even notice anything out of place when i took the picture, which is what totally boggles my mind.
content.summary: Unexplained object captured in photo i was taking of a jet

content.detailedDescription:
At a soccer game yesterday in howland, our team was sitting on the field stretching. i went to stretch my quads and laid on my back with my leg under me. as i stared up, i noticed how clear the sky was, and i could see the moon perfectly. then, as my eyes scanned the sky, i noticed an object that i jokingly pointed out to my friends as "a russian spy-plane!"

as i stared at this strange aircraft, i noticed that it was extremely high, and was white in color (against the blue sky), with the shape of a "z". the closest shape above would be compared to a boomerang, but one side of the the object was facing the opposite direction of another point, giving the object a "z"-like appearance. it was common knowledge that no regular aircraft took that shape or could fly at such a high altitude, moving so unbearably slow across the sky away from the moon (moving southwest). also, the object made absolutely no audible noise, nor did it emit any type of visible exhaust. we discussed what it could be, while staring at this incredibly high, white, object. right before our eyes, it began emitting a white light out of the western-most side of the object. the light did not flash, blink, or flicker; it was a constant white beam, but it was not bright, and was still barely noticeable.

after about 3 minutes of staring at this object, it had vanished right before our eyes. my reactional thought process was "there is no way...That could not have been a u.F.O.", as i tried to think of logical explanations for the sudden complete disappearance of this object, in the cloudless sky. i truly believe, after thinking about it all night, that this must have been a u.F.O.... no aircraft known to man would hover at such a high altitude, moving incredibly slowly, and vanish instantly.
content.summary: At a soccer game, saw slow moving, extremely high u.F.O.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside and there smalls groups of people looking up.  i inquired about it, and someone pointed up at what looked to be like a star. it was a white dot.  open closer inspection there were a lot of them! i counted about 15+. folks before me told me they saw more but they started to fade. some of the "white dots" were completely still while others were quickly zooming around.  some came together to form clusters.  they would come together then separate.  there was a group of dots forming a triangle shape, while another group looked to form like orion's belt.  once again, at times, the dots would just stay still and fade in and out.  the sky was completely clear and blue except for these star like objects.  they seemed to be coming from all directions, but mostly coming from the west and north moving south and east.   there was not a cloud in sight.  people were making comments all around me, but one by one, they would quiet and just stare.  the crowd got larger.  a man with a camera started to take photos.  when he zoomed in, they seemed to be yellow in flat but rounded shape.  there was one that was rather large (close up?) that started to float up and started to fly higher and higher. at first look, it looked like a plastic bag because its shape kept changing so i thought nothing of it.  as it floated higher and higher, it started to look like the other objects we were seeing so high in the sky.  it was pale cream to yellow color.  it was scary mostly because there was no particular flight pattern.  they were going in strange directions.  they would fade, i'm assuming because they were getting higher and higher and too small to see.  they looked like flying stars.
content.summary: What looked to be like stars moving around about 15 i saw myself

content.detailedDescription: I was at the heritage garden at the rio grande botanical gardens when i noticed a large, dark line in the sky.  it occasionally drifted and would bend in on itself, floating like an extremely large balloon.  i saw several planes and a hot air balloon aloft at the same time, but i really couldn't get a good idea of distance or size, although it was certainly large and not all that far off.  i was able to round up some more witnesses, and we watched for about 50 minutes as it drifted around the sky, occasionally changing color from black to silver, which may have been due to sunlight hitting its surface.  it drifted north northwest along the rio grande, and we observed it until it was barely visible anymore.  when close, we could not discern any distinguishable characteristics.  it was a long line, probably cylindrical or tubelike, and just black.  none of us have any idea as to what it could have been, but i'm sure there were plenty of witnesses besides those of us at the botanical gardens.
content.summary: A black, undulating line in the sky that drifted and changed color to silver on occasion.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking to my car which was parked in a parking garage at a low rise complex when i happened to look up at the sky.  i saw this slim elongated piece of white light traveling slowly across the skyline at quite a distance away.  it just slowly glided, no change of direction or other unusual movements.  it definitely was not a plane as no blinking lights usually seen when a plane is ascending or decending, no dark part as you would see with a plane - it was solid white bright light.  it appeared to be elongated, but could have been the edge of a disc as seen from my vantage point.  it was moving in a northern direction and seemed to be slightly decending.  there is no airport in the direction the object was moving.  i watched the object until it was out of sight. i have no photos.

it was dusk, temperature about 75 degrees, no wind or moisture.  it was a clear day.

i can't explain what made me look up at the sky at that point, other than this happens to me frequently when something strange is occuring, such as strange cloud formations, flying objects, or other situation i should know about, esp maybe.  there was no noise emitting from the object, at least from where i was observing it.  when i first noticed the object, i felt uneasy as i immediately realized it was probably not one of our earthly aircrafts.  i was curious, so watched it as long as it was in my view. i was somewhat disturbed by seeing this object, and had trouble sleeping that night.  i'm ok about it now.

after viewing the object, i went to a grocery store in my area, and was discussing this incident with a checkout clerk.  he told me he had also seen what he thought was a ufo in his neighborhood, but the description was different than the one i saw.

thanks for the opportunity to file this report.  i appreciate the objectives of your organization.  the more light shed on this phenomena, the better.
content.summary: Saw an elongated piece of white light  traveling slowly across the skyline.

content.detailedDescription: This is the photo i took. there are two distinct lights if you look close there are three faint lights in background forming a triangle. i am not sure if those are the ones that faded or something else. this was taken from my samsung solstice cell phone. picture taken at 2 mp. this is the original picture.
content.summary: Several red lights filled the eastern sky then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
at 9:43pm on 10-12-10, i was standing on my pourch letting my dog go to the bathroom.  i looked up and saw a small flashing light moving north to south.  i watched for a few seconds as it changed from blue to red and then to yellow.  the flash was constant, as was the slow movement.  i noticed right away that it made no noise, and there wasn't any other aeroplane in the sky at that time.  i went inside and grabbed my cell phone to take a video of it.  i videoed it for 1 and 1 1/4 minutes before it was obstructed by trees above my house.  i then took my dog inside, and followed it with my eye as it went across the sky for another 2 minutes or so.  i finally lost sight of it as it went over the horizon.  i rush inside to looked on "www.Flightstats.Com" to see if any aeroplanes were flying over my house at that time, and could find none.
   i live in arlington, texas.  so i am very familar with aeroplanes in the sky, as i live in the flight paths of 4 major airports.  this objest seemed to be moving to slow for an aeroplane, and it made no noise.  it also seemed not to have the same lights as aeroplanes do, like on the wings, and the flashing faa lights.  
   as a member of mufon, i tried to take a good video of the object, by keeping the house next door in the frame, and keeping the camera as still as possible.  that was the only thing in the sky for at least another 5-7 minutes, and it was quiet, (no aeroplane noise).  interresting note, about an hour before my sighting, (8:45pm) my lights flickered, and then i heard a big "boom" like an electric transformer blew.  this also happened again, around 30 minutes later, (10:20pm).  again, my lights flickered for a split second, and then i heard a "boom", but far away this time.  the power never went out, and nothing happened after that.  i doubt it's related, but thought i would mention it.
content.summary: Small light in sky flashing with blue, red, and yellow, moving north to south.

content.detailedDescription: One evening in late august ,had to b round 7 maybe 8 pm , clear day , me an my girlfriend at the time had just pulled up at my home in a area of cumberland county tn called homestead.  as soon as i exited the truck i leaned with my arms on the bed of the truck an looked to my left in a area that's a long valley between sum good sized mountains and my mouth absolutely hit the ground. i could not take my eyes off what i saw.  my girlfriend asked me what was i lookin at and i couldn't even respond all i could do was point. she looked an said holy $%!*  is that what i think it is ? i still couldn't answer. only laugh in disbelief.  we were staring at three rectangular verticle lights that were flashing a quick red blue green an everyso often white. i can judge the distance fairly easily maybe a 1/4 mile at the most.  these lights would start into a certain sequence flashing. there was no noise no balloon no nothing. these lights started turning from left to right rockin like it was on a center. it was maybe 75 ft off the ground and slowly  going north towards crab orchard. by this time it had started well into dusk and it started slowly upward. by this time some stars started showing an this thing became like a pulsar star. flickering to match the stars. now by this time we were histerical as both of us could not believe what we had just saw.  this thing stayed. now this is where it gets even more exciting. we by all means were so curious as to what this thing was going to do that we could not take our eyes off it.  this thing got really bright started flashing red blue green with each rectangular light designated to a certain color an i be damn if here floated another one. they both flashed at the same time as to signal or communicate to one another. by this time its around 11 pm. after a few mins it did the same thing. it became like a star. well after 30 mins these things started flashing again and damn if they didn't slowly shift locations went approximately 1/4 mile and flashed again an stopped. became like a star once again. well 15 mins go by they started signaling again. here comes a third one from the west. does the same thing flashes then becomes like a star. this goes on for at least an hour. they would b star like then all of a sudden the flashing an then slowly change location. over the next 4 hours 5 more come in. by this time we were so histerical we didn't know what the hell we were seeing. they would all flash together an slowly change location. well now its around 430 maybe 5 am. i'm watching 9 of these things making sure i know which "stars" to watch. its slowly becoming dayliight. these things started up with the flashin an the one that was over homestead started decending to the ground an disapeared below the tree line. i was hysterical my girlfriend was freakin the hell out as was i. i could not believe what we were watching. so maybe 15 mins go by an once again the flashing then slowly the one that decended came back up an they all started to move. they only moved a little distance and became still. the strangest part was they faded like the stars do when morning comes. when the daylight came they faded away unnoticed. i had to drive my girlfriend to her parents house cuz she was in tears. i still cannot believe what we saw. i had to tell this. i've had this on my mind for a long time
content.shape: Flash,   Square,   Rectagular,   Star-like,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: I cant not tell this story  its drove me crazy for over 10 years

content.detailedDescription: I went outside on my porch to smoke about 23:15 pm, i looked up to the north sky and i saw something flying really low in the sky what i thought was a large flock of birds.. as it got closer, i realized that it was a triangle shape of lights that were kind of dim, as it flew by i could vagely tell that the back of it was kind of transparent. i ran in the house to get my daughter because i knew then that this was a ufo, when we came back out it had moved a great distantance into the sky flying south and she couldn't see it.. omg people they are real...
content.summary: I saw a group of lights in the north sky tonight, it was a ufo

content.detailedDescription:
there was a wild camping area with "revel camp fires". i was at the quiet family camping sites. i was on the very edge-cars would come to the end of a parking rd & they turned right 50 yards or less from my camp site-keeping me up most of the night. i kinda gave up & exited my tent for a late night snack, hoping it would help me finally sleep. it was quite dark there was no one in my area awake (no fires nor lights on) in the family section behind me-the neighboring camp site had left the tiki torch on closest to my site. i was sitting in my fold out chair when a beautiful glowing orange orb came towards the tree line near me- the trees were tall ne tx pines. i may have been looking toward the noisy campsites or gazing to see if it was another car coming towards me/my site, i sort of thought the glow of their fire was enhancing brighter then thought some sort of light was beamed @ me as if from a car --there were none for approx 5 min. at 1st it appeared that it was coming @ me but didn't make any quick turns that were obvious to me it just glided with ease. almost unapparent to the eye it lined up with trees & made a slight degree shift. the orb traveled the length of the adjoining field on the other side of the trees from me. the height was 3-5 ft from the tops of the trees, floating in a perfect line. i followed its movements until it was gone from my sight i looked a second time rechecking if it were still there-the trees became thicker @ the point of disappearance. i imagined that no one from the revel fires saw it - they were screaming, shouting, drumming, dancing & well partying a lot! if they did i would guess they were too wasted to be sure they saw anything.  i got really spooked after being in complete awe just seconds before. realizing the torch was on near me i figured "it(ufo)" saw me. i quickly moved into my tent. i told my sleeping partner of the situation & she told me, "they were not interested in me-they were there for the other camp area(or something that imparted/reflected that notion)" this was almost comforting for i had that sense prior to waking her. approx 15 min after, to max 2 hrs-i saw lights glowing orange not red & @ another point around then was white lights near tent. i was kinda freaked out & was worried it was back & i was trying to sleep so much it all became a blurr once in the tent. 
  the orb was a brilliant perfect deep fiery orange- at the round edges/the points rounded away from me it had a shadowy quality or sort of slivery  dark element. warp effect yet remaining perfectly spherical- this shading was within the object. there was absolutely no sound emanating from the object or any where near me. the revel fires were approx 2 football fields away.
content.summary: Orange fire colored orb approx pumpkin sized/about head sized/12"x12"(1 ft circumference)

content.detailedDescription: Randomly looked out my window at 2:30 am and spotted an orb like object that was brighter than any star in the sky, it was distinctive enough to catch my attention right away as it was moving left to right and then started heading inland towards the shore from the sea. the object appeared to be cycling between red and blue colors at a very high rate of speed. i watched the object with a pair of binoculars and it literally looked like some kind of energy field over the hull of some kind of large craft and then it slowly dissolved as it headed inland. the sky was very clear that night.
content.summary: Blue/red orb spotted curving, moving in an erratic pattern and then disappearing while heading inland.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at ann morrison park with my 8 year old son and a family friend of ours playing frisbee golf.  as we finished one of the holes and began to walk our family friend asked me what that was in the sky.  i saw something in the sky just kind of hovering there.  
   i am a new resident to boise and my wife who lived here in the past always asks me if i have seen any hot air balloons since we moved here.  when i first saw the object i assumed that is what it was, a hot air balloon.  but then, as i looked more closely i saw that what i was looking at was not a balloon.  it was angled on all sides.  i noticed shadows on the side of it being cast by the setting sun.  i immediately began to walk towards the object.  i noticed as soon as i started walking that whatever this was, wasn't far away at all.  with every step i could see that i was getting closer to it.  when i was, what i approximate to be 40 yards from the object, which also in my approximation was 200' off the ground, i stopped and watched.  it was shifting what appeared to be just a few feet from side to side.  not a rocking motion, but a deliberate shift with a pause and sometimes up to a minute in between shifts.  it would also on some occasions move quickly from one side to the other.  there was absolutely no vertical movement whatsoever.  also, the object made precise rotating movements.  the only way that i can compare it to something that most people are familiar with is the way that gears 'click' in a clock.  only the sudden movements would go a 'click' or two in one direction and then one 'click' back.  followed by, for example, 3 right-1 left, etc.  i stood (40 yards approx. away) for 20 or so minutes watching and trying to rationally to figure out what this thing was.  i worked in the aviation field for 11 years before moving to boise and i am very familiar with airframes and propulsion systems.  the only thing that man has in the air that could even remotely resemble this object would be a satellite and even that bears very little resemblance to this object.  it was pewter in color with a bit of a shine on it.  there were black markings on the object.  there were also two circular patterns (?) on either side of it.  there was no sound.  
   after the 20 minutes or so had passed, i started walking towards the object with my son and friend.  we continued slowly until we were standing directly underneath it.  we stood there for roughly 5 minutes.  while standing there, the object made a split second 360 degree rotation.  this happened from a still position and immediately following the rotation, was dead still again.  we continued on the path we were on walking straight from the spot we were originally watching from until we were 20 yards or so behind it.  the craft wasn���t symmetric on all sides.  the sides of the craft seemed to be the same, but what i refer to as the ���front and back��� of the craft are only relative to what it seemed to be.  the ���front and back��� of the craft were not the same.  it had different angles on these sides.  we then slowly proceeded around the object, on the west facing side, keeping our 20 yard distance, until we were at our original vantage point approximately 20 yards in front (where we stood for 20 minutes upon first approaching the object).  
   that is when things started to get creepy.  before my eyes, i saw an orangish/white light come on the bottom of the object.  as i am wondering what i am seeing, the craft seamlessly turned from this angled three dimensional shape into an oval, egg shape.  it still hadn���t moved and made no sounds.  my son and friend started to get scared so we began to walk away.  i kept my eyes on the object as we walked away and as we walked it changed again.  this time to a very slim boomerang shape with the rounded end facing skyward.  the time the object spent with the egg shape and boomerang shape was probably 60 seconds to 2 minutes.  when it changed to the boomerang shape we again stopped and watched as it began to ���flex and wobble���.  it still hadn���t moved since we first saw it.  at that point, approximately 30 seconds into wobbling it looked as if it disappeared into a cloud.  i thought that was odd since the sky was clear for the most part.  how did the object travel from 200��� off the ground and seem to enter a cloud and disappear without any obvious movement?  
    if you���ll notice the date of the sighting and the date i am posting this, you���ll see some time has gone by since the sighting.  i have been researching what this could���ve been and it appears that what i saw was a ���probe���.  i am posting the crummy pictures that i was able to make with my cell phone.  zoom in and you can see that the entire time i was watching the object it appears, in the pictures at least, to nearly constantly change shape.  the light that appeared orangish/white looks red in the photos.  many other people witnessed the sighting with me at the park.  at no point during the sighting did i feel afraid.  the word that i would use to describe the way that i felt was ���awe���.  whatever this object was had technology that so far surpasses our own that it is indescribable.  it wasn���t until i got home and was able to sit and think about what i had seen that an eerie feeling set in.  
    the object was first observed at approximately 7:20 in the afternoon on 9/26.  it disappeared into a cloud at approximately 8:00.  i even mapped the spot on google earth:  43���36���38n, 116���13���15w.
content.summary: Probe seen at ann morrison park

content.detailedDescription: I saw a white-colored cylindrical object flying slowly but somewhat erratically over my area this afternoon.  object appeared cylindrical in shape and had a diameter of 20 feet or less and a length of 50 feet or less. it was white. it had a trailing tale or tentacle like objects dangling from it. there was a band around the middle of it. it had windows. the object revolved about on its own axis head over tail every few seconds.  it was  about 3000 feet up or less and traveling from north to south over our area.  i could see it clearly. i was standing at the back of my truck watching it for ten minutes. it was not flying fast at all, very leisurely. at first i thought it was a helium balloon floating off, but after observing it i can say it was too large for a child's ballon, and it was turning over and over.  i went to my truck to get my camera, then lost sight of it. i do not think it was a satellite, it was too low. the rotation it was doing was strange to me. it had been higher up in the sky when i first spotted it. actually, i think i saw it on my way to the store as well. so it was still around when i got out of the store, nearly a half-hour later.
content.summary: White cylindrical object flying erratically over my area

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my living room on the computer. i had my children go outside to get their bikes out of the driveway. one of my children came running in, and told me "hurry you have to see this, there is something weird in the sky". i walked out and looked east to see several (15-20) bright red lights in the sky which continued to rise higher with no specific pattern. they did not move as one object would. the lights did not create any specific shape, and seemed each light had its own movement. the highest point had a few red lights and the rest seemed to follow those at the top. i ran to get a camera and could only find my cell phone, which i was able to capture a photo at the end of this unusual phenomenon. it only shows two lights. the others were disappearing so quickly i was barely able to get a photo. my children and one of their friends were witnesses. a gentleman at the end of our street was also standing in the middle of the road looking up in the same direction and i can only assume he witnessed this as well. 
i was very excited after this and quickly went to a neighbors to see if they had seen it. they did not however their daughter claimed to have seen the last few. i then went to our other neighbors who is an officer to find out if any reports had come in. the officer called and stated that dispatch had several reports of odd lights in the sky. unfortunately when i tried to find the reports in the local police activity report, i was unable to find any specific report. he also had a friend contact a brother who is an air traffic controller, to verify there were no military exercises that evening. it was confirmed, there were none. we did see airplanes still flying around directly after. the lights were not blinking, they were solid and as bright as a star, there was only 1 star visible in that direction on this evening.
during the sighting i was in utter awe, and confused. i have never seen anything like this in my entire life and desperately want some answers. after the incident i have not been able to stop asking people if they saw it. i need clarification for myself and my children. this took place between 7:51-7:55 pm. i will upload the photo later as i need to get cable to upload it from my phone. i wanted to post and hopefully get some much needed answers.
content.summary: Several red lights filled the eastern sky then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I am reporter for radio station *(possible identifying info deleted--cms/sg) in albuquerque. this incident took place about 72 hours after having a discussion in the news room about a sighting one of my co-workers mentioned happened near his house out in the bernalillo area. we joked about it. i remember going to the mufon website to see if there were any reports on it as we talked. there weren't. my boss and i teased him gently, and he joined in the fun. he wasn't upset by us. he was curious about it that's all. we all talked about the story of the century and such, asked if anyone landed and got out, had he been drinking, you know, the normal b.S.Ing guys do, and then we all got back to work. about two or three nights later, 
i was asleep in bed when i was awakened by an extremely loud, sustained whooshing sound over my house.  it was not moving like perhaps a low flying jet from kirtland air force base with the after-burners engaged. it was not whomping and buzzing, like the blades of a circling helicopter, nor was it the sound of a helicopter hovering in stealth mode where the sound is suppressed. this was a sound loud enough to wake the dead! it was like the space shuttle was taking off right outside my window. in fact, i was surprised my wife and daughter weren't disturbed by it, even though they're very sound sleepers. as i look back on it now, i am surprised the dog wasn't awake and barking. it was so loud and steady, i was afraid to look out the windows or go outside to see what it was. i lay in bed too terrified to move. the sound continued for what must have been 10-30 minutes or more, and then suddenly decreased in volume and was gone. my first thought after it was over was that a factory nearby was releasing some kind of gas pressure, because it slowly settled to a slight hissing sound and was gone. looking back i remember there was no light outside, like the searchlight from a police copter. being a radio news reporter, i am familiar with those sights and sounds. this was something i've never heard before, or since. i talked with **(name deleted--cms/sg) by telephone today,(10-12-2010),  because it keeps nagging at me,"what the hell was that!?" he urged me to make a report, so here it is. if it was a factory, why haven't i heard it before, and why have i not heard it again? i wish i had been more courageous and gone outside to look.
content.summary: Loud non-moving whooshing sound over my house.

content.detailedDescription: Who is in charge of this website ? why the f#! are they putting stupid stories on the main page that have long since been discredited. what are you trying to achieve ?
content.summary: What is going on ?

content.detailedDescription:
Around 9:30pm on september 26, 2010, i went outside to lock-up my car and close the garage door as i always do.  i noticed a rather bright star just above the house across the street.  while i was looking at this "star" i noticed a group of silverish oval craft flying from north to south between myself and this "star."  i watched until this formation moved out of sight (about 45sec to 1 minute).  then, i noticed the "star" turned and headed nnw and it was a helicopter.  this helicopter had sat there and watched the crafts go by.  once they were gone, the helicopter flew away.  in total disbelief, i went inside and got my wife.  she came out to look with me.  after she and i stood out there for a minute or two, we noticed a single oval craft moving along the exact same path as the first five, from north to south.  i asked her if she saw it too.  at first she wouldn't admit to seeing it, but i could tell she had.  i asked her again, and she said she did, but she didn't know what to think of it.  neither of us could identify the crafts.  

as a biologist, i am well aware of the processes of evolution and i do admit that i see no reason why life could not exist on other planets.  however, while i have always been a little intriged by ufos, i thought most reports were either hoaxes or people looking for attention.  i am now a believer and i have been looking for other people who saw the same thing that night.  i really still don't know what to think of them.  was it from space?  i do live about five minutes from nasa's johnson space center.  could the crafts have been nasa tests?  i just don't know.
content.summary: Five oval craft flying in v formation followed a few minutes by single object

content.detailedDescription:
I observed this thing move too fast to be a star i'm familiar with and a couple of other objects around it for two hours on the night of october 9th from about 2100 to 2300 hours. it appeared in the ne sky and appeared to transit about 25 degrees in the time we watched it. i was able to observe it on a meade 4504 telescope (thanks neil!) where i noted it rapidly leaving the field, and exhibiting blue yellow and red as well as white light blinking lights.

i was observing saturn in my backyard when a very strong winking drew my attention to the ne to the direction of mt. wilson.  the object was brighter then polaris, and too high in the sky to be a part of the mt. wilson communications suite.  i grabbed a pair of 30x binoculars and could see that the object had discernible movement.  i went inside and got my wife who also noted its strangeness and she got her camera while i went and got the telescope described above.

i couldn't get over the impression it was a beacon.  the next day i uploaded 2 short videos of the event to youtube and did a search to see if anyone else had observed a similar phenomenon on oct 9th and found over 20 examples from all over the world.  

the next day today october 11th i did another search and found over 40 examples from the night of the 10th.  i collected what i did and posted two blogs with the compilation. *(link moved to additional evidence section below--cms/sg). 

for about the last 4 months i have felt different from my normally different self.
content.summary: Strange star over southern california

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in front yard of vacation home facing south and looking at jet contrails passing by on crystal clear day.A circular,silvery globe appeared under one contrail and proceeded overhead in nne direction until it passed over the horizon. the object appeared to be almost as high as the commercial jets yet left no contrail and made no noise. it was traveling about 2-3 times faster than the jets and flew straight. i originally thought it may be a mylar ballon or weather ballon  but it seemed too high and traveling too fast for those objects i had the impreesion it was under power not just floating by, but no noise after it passed and no contrail which confused me. i wondered if it is possible to see a satelitte in the daytime because i have seen them at night and that was the way it appeared to be moving to me  i did not have time to get camera or binoculars
content.summary: Circular object passed overhead from ssw to nne direction

content.detailedDescription:
Was on computer reading about the world news on the cnn page lastnight around 11:30pm,when i decided to look out the front door which is beside the desk i was sitting at,and all of a sudden an eggshape fireball appeared in the treetops at low altitude and flew very fast from one end to the other,id say within 8 seconds or less.
extremely fast object.This is the 4th night in a row that i have been seeing strange objects flying fast in the sky.A few nights ago i also seen a light so fast that left the rainbow colors in the dead of night 
dark red,purple,and i think a strange golden yellow were present,went so fast i was unable to see how many colors were actually in it..It also had 4 trails,not just one trail following behind that one.So four colors.Decided to report because it seems this is becoming an every night thing.The nights are colder now and the sky has been very clear here in cape breton,i have a very large view of the sky from my area.Very open and rural.Is it me or is something about to take place we don't know about?Because it is very busy up there i must say.

i do not like reporting much because i reported a story on this website in the past,and the night after i posted an abduction story a black helicopter flew over the house at middle morning around 2:30 am, with a very bright red light attached to the end that did not blink.I heard the helicopter loud and clear because i was on this site reading other stories at the time.And it was defensibly military,and i live in canada remember not the us.I truly think this website is monitored in some way by some sort of agency,and i think that the black helicopter phenom may be  connected with stealth monitoring programs in some way or another..I don't really know,but just a warning.
content.summary: eggs hape fireball appears as soon as i look out door,and is looking as if on fire with long tail trailing behind

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i went for a drive and stopped where the night before we witnessed lights in the sky which did not move for around 20 minutes they just blinked in the clouds and finally moved towards the west. last night we returned about 2 hours earlier . i was using the bonoculars and had just passed them to my wife when as she put them to her eyes i noticed a bright light which grew larger quickly i asked her fo the bonoculars back and as she passed them to me she also saw the light, i focused on the light and as i was looking it turned at an angle and i could see the whole side of it. the sun was to the south west just going behind the hills in the distance. when i first saw the side of the object it looked alot like a torpedo in shape , i'm guessing about 75ft in length and i would estimate 10-15miles i'm not real good with distance. but i do know what we saw.In the time that i gave the bonoculars to my wife it went up at an angle into the cloud above. when she looked at the object all she saw was a black dot. it all lasted less than 5 seconds.
content.summary: Bright light,

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving a limo for a wedding party and took them to huntington beach park in bay village for some pictures.It was a sunny day. pulling into the parking lot off of lake rd. across from porter creek dr. i positioned the car in the lane closest to the beach access. the car was facing west. i got out to tend to the wedding party as they got out of the vehicle. at this point i saw something in the sky, it was south-west from my perspective. after making sure that everyone was ok and on their way for some photos, i went back and watched the object further.

at first i thought the object might be a balloon or some sort of helicopter because it didn't move from where it was in the sky. as i watched it, i noticed that it didn't look like any aircraft i had seen, nor a balloon or kite. the thing that stood out to me about most was that it didn't move from its location in the sky at all. i watched it for about 10 minutes, photographing it two to three minutes after i first noticed it.

the object was fairly small in the sky, it didn't look like a huge craft. it was black, saucer shaped. it was at a good distance, so i couldn't make out any details, but the profile i saw reminded me of a woman's brimmed hat.

as i watched it, i noticed, as i said earlier, it didn't move, at all. i felt amazement and disbelief as i was looking at this thing. i think i was the only person looking at it in the immediate area, no one else seemed to notice it. as i looked at it, the sun was to my right. getting in the shade of the trees made it easier to watch. i would walk away from time to time to see where the wedding party was. 

after about ten minutes i got back into the car for a bit to rest my eyes. when i got out of the car after about five minutes, the object was gone.
content.summary: A black object hung in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I've seen enough anomalous things in the night sky over the years not to become too excited when i spot something unusual now. as a rule, it's airplanes that use strobe lights so it it blinks, it's probably one of ours. i generally take a closer look if the light is constant regardless of direction or if it pulses slowly brighter/dimmer as it moves.

last night was one of the strangest. it was only a light, reddish, very dim and was way too high up to distinguish the shape behind it  but it was the motion of the light that first caught my attention.

i was standing at the back of my house in bridgwater (somerset uk) smoking and looking up at the stars. i always look up while i'm out at night, as i say, i've seen plenty of interesting things before so i keep an interested eye open.

i noticed it first directly above me moving from over my house in a westerly to easterly direction. after a few seconds, it changed to southerly, not a gradual turn or banking movement but a right-angled jerk to the new heading. a few seconds later it was going easterly after another jerk to change direction. and so it went on. every few seconds, sometimes just after one second, this dim red light danced it's way across the sky, generally 'stepping' left then right, north then south. sometimes a wobbling motion was visible and sometimes, more remarkably it just blinked out, then re-appeared a short distanced away, jerking and jumping as it moved on it's way.

eventually, it blinked out and i lost sight of it as it headed south. i'm not sure whether it just didn't blink on again or whether its low luminosity made it just too dim to keep up with.

that's it - nothing spectacular to look at, but remarkable to watch with its erratic, sudden direction changes, wobbling movement and constant disappearing/re-appearing. i can't say how high up it was - too difficult to gauge but it was completely silent as it went.
content.summary: Dim (red but constant)  slow moving light, erratic movement, disappearing then re-appearing

content.detailedDescription: I was at my job at this time. one of the men i work with was outside at break. he called me outside to view a bright blue light in the sky. it was located in the north north-eastern part. the light was a bright blue, it hovered close to the horizon then would shoot upward. it would bob from side to side. at times the light grew brighter and then would fade to almost nothing. at one time it elongated to a tube and then moved back to a round shape. one of the men thought that it was a romote control craft. but i didn't think that they had that kind of range as it would go up higher in the sky. we all had to return inside to continute our jobs. we were all curious as to what it could have been.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright blue light that moved quickly and erratically.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving through a neighborhood off on thompson road, at approximately 1:01 a.M. and seen a blue circular object in the sky, and we immediately stopped the car. the object was spinning and dipping up and down in the sky, which is what cought me offguard, i had no idea what it was, it would turn blue for about 20 seconds, then flash red and white for about 5 seconds and change back to blue. as we all started talking, we were thinking it was a plane, but we then realized that planes do not go that fast and crazy throughout the sky, & that is when we all said ufo at the same time. we tried to follow the object, and we eventually lost it, because it was moving so quick. it looked as if went straight back up into the sky. i was shocked. it was one of the coolest, yet scariest things i had ever seen. we immediately called and reported it to a radio station.
content.summary: Blue, red, and white flashing lights very fast through sky

content.detailedDescription: A bright shining object flying across the sky in an arc from the horizon up and around then back into the area it came from caught my eye.  it looked relatively low-flying and moved like no man-made craft.  it looked blue-ish silvery, and i have to stress how shiny the lights looked.  it didn't really leave a tracer, but the lights did sort of blur together.  i was a passenger.  we had just gotten off i-205 and were headed toward clackamas town center.  i screamed what the hell was that, the driver didn't see anything.  just as i started to explain what i'd seen, there it was again.  this time he saw it.  we watched as it flew across the sky, it looked like it came from the same general vicinity up and into the sky, then turned around, kind of looped around like a boomerang, and went back to where it came from, generally.  as we watched it go through the air, the driver pointed out that it moved too fast to be a plane, and looked like it was too close to the ground.  then when it turned as it did and kind of looped through the air, we both were really taken aback.  this second time it came through (or maybe it was a second one?) i got a better look at it.  maybe it changed angles or something, but i was more able to recognize it as a row of lights.  although the overall color just registered as bright white silvery shining blue (kind of like led lights), i did think i may have seen a little red, but i can't be sure.  it did not shoot through the air like an arrow, it moved maybe at a forty-five degree angle to the direction it was headed.  very shiny and bright.  very obviously there.  it looked about an inch to two inches long, which made me feel it was very close to the ground.  we were both flabberghasted.
content.summary: Line of very bright shining lights (blue & red) traveling quickly across the sky back and forth.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west back to my school in pa on i-76 near ephrata, pa in lancaster county (last exit i remember seeing around this time) at 9 at night. i was trying to watch some flashes of lightning that had been going in the sky as i was driving. there was barely anyone on the roads and it wasn't raining at this time. as i was looking up at the sky i noticed two bright lights that i first thought was an airplane. but after glancing up at for about a minute i noticed it there weren't any blinking identification lights. it was two lights very close together with what looked like an outer shape to it kind of like a v shape. appeared to be below the cloud cover but not really close to the ground. it moved very slowly away from the lightning storm, north to south, looking as if it just went through the storm. when i first noticed it i thought it was strange that a plane would be flying through a lightning storm like that, which first caught my interest. watched it for about ten minutes just flying slowly through the sky until it disappeared to the south. i know it was at 9:04pm because i called my girlfriend to tell her of what i was seeing. location is approximate as ephrata was the exit i remember seeing around that time. wanted to know if anyone else saw this.
content.summary: Two bright star like lights flying slowly away from thunder storm
